response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value to us, and we believe it would be equally valuable to you. We understand its worth to both parties, and thus, we are extending this offer with the hope of creating a mutually beneficial transaction.

We propose a purchase price of $950,000 for the product. This figure reflects our commitment to fair trade while also allowing us to ensure the continued quality and availability of the product for future buyers like yourself.

Please let us know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer. We are confident that this product will meet your expectations and bring you immense satisfaction. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to contact us.

Looking forward to your positive response,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
